= VQL Mapping
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Purpose

GraphQL fields map to VQL queries and subscriptions. Proof tier is selected per
field to balance realtime performance and audit strength.

[cols="1,2,1",options="header"]
|===
| GraphQL Field | VQL | Proof

| telemetrySnapshot
| FROM verisim:temporal WHERE metric = 'telemetry' LIMIT 1
| light

| routeForensicsSnapshot
| FROM verisim:graph WHERE target = $target PROOF strict
| full

| auditSnapshot
| FROM verisim:temporal WHERE kind = 'audit' PROOF strict
| full

| telemetryStream
| SUBSCRIBE verisim:temporal WHERE metric = 'telemetry'
| light

| routeForensicsStream
| SUBSCRIBE verisim:graph WHERE target = $target PROOF strict
| full

| auditAttestedStream
| SUBSCRIBE verisim:temporal WHERE kind = 'audit' PROOF strict
| full
|===
